relationships.source: 中国平安保险（集团）股份有限公司
relationships.target: 黄淑芬事件

description.zh-cn: 在黄淑芬事件中，肇事车辆在中国平安保险投保，引发了关于保险公司在理赔过程中角色的讨论。
description.en: In the Huang Shufen incident, the at-fault vehicle was insured with Ping An Insurance, sparking discussions about the role of insurance companies in the claims process.
